# How to Find Your WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 Digit Serial Number
 
If you have a Hauppauge WinTV-HVR-950Q USB TV tuner, you may need to enter your 24 digit serial number to activate the device or install the software. The serial number is a unique code that identifies your product and proves your ownership. But where can you find it?
 
In this article, we will show you how to locate your WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number and what to do if you lose it or can't read it.
 
**DOWNLOAD âœ¦ [https://t.co/1e6uW1ezSh](https://t.co/1e6uW1ezSh)**


 
## Where is the WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 Digit Serial Number?
 
The WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number can be found in two places:
 
- On the back of the WinTV-HVR-950Q device. There is a sticker with a barcode and a number that starts with "SN". This is your serial number. It should look something like this: SN 1-001-1018-1234567890.
- On the CD sleeve that came with the WinTV-HVR-950Q device. There is a label with a number that starts with "SN". This is also your serial number. It should match the one on the device.

You will need to enter this serial number when you install the WinTV software or when you activate the device online.
 
## What if I Lose or Can't Read My WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 Digit Serial Number?
 
If you lose or can't read your WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number, don't panic. There are some ways to recover it or get a replacement.

- If you have already installed the WinTV software on your computer, you can find your serial number in the About WinTV window. To access it, open the WinTV application and click on Help > About WinTV. You will see your serial number displayed on the screen.
- If you have registered your product online, you can log in to your Hauppauge account and view your serial number under My Products. To register your product, go to [https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support\_registration.html](https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support_registration.html) and follow the instructions.
- If you have neither installed the software nor registered your product, you can contact Hauppauge customer support and request a replacement serial number. You will need to provide proof of purchase and some information about your device, such as model number and MAC address. To contact Hauppauge customer support, go to [https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support\_contact.html](https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support_contact.html) and choose your region.

## Conclusion
 
The WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number is an important code that you need to activate and use your USB TV tuner. You can find it on the back of the device or on the CD sleeve that came with it. If you lose or can't read it, you can try to recover it from the software, online registration, or customer support.

# How to Find Your WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 Digit Serial Number
 
If you have a Hauppauge WinTV-HVR-950Q USB TV tuner, you may need to enter your 24 digit serial number to activate the device or install the software. The serial number is a unique code that identifies your product and proves your ownership. But where can you find it?
 
In this article, we will show you how to locate your WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number and what to do if you lose it or can't read it.
 
## Where is the WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 Digit Serial Number?
 
The WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number can be found in two places:

- On the back of the WinTV-HVR-950Q device. There is a sticker with a barcode and a number that starts with "SN". This is your serial number. It should look something like this: SN 1-001-1018-1234567890.
- On the CD sleeve that came with the WinTV-HVR-950Q device. There is a label with a number that starts with "SN". This is also your serial number. It should match the one on the device.

You will need to enter this serial number when you install the WinTV software or when you activate the device online.
 
## What if I Lose or Can't Read My WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 Digit Serial Number?
 
If you lose or can't read your WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number, don't panic. There are some ways to recover it or get a replacement.

- If you have already installed the WinTV software on your computer, you can find your serial number in the About WinTV window. To access it, open the WinTV application and click on Help > About WinTV. You will see your serial number displayed on the screen.
- If you have registered your product online, you can log in to your Hauppauge account and view your serial number under My Products. To register your product, go to [https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support\_registration.html](https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support_registration.html) and follow the instructions.
- If you have neither installed the software nor registered your product, you can contact Hauppauge customer support and request a replacement serial number. You will need to provide proof of purchase and some information about your device, such as model number and MAC address. To contact Hauppauge customer support, go to [https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support\_contact.html](https://www.hauppauge.com/site/support/support_contact.html) and choose your region.

## How to Use Your WinTV-HVR-950Q USB TV Tuner
 
Once you have your WinTV-HVR-950Q 24 digit serial number, you can start using your USB TV tuner to watch and record live TV on your computer. Here are some steps to follow:

1. Connect the WinTV-HVR-950Q device to a USB port on your computer. You may need a USB extension cable if the port is too far from the TV source.
2. Connect the TV source to the WinTV-HVR-950Q device. You can use an antenna, cable TV, or satellite TV. The device has a built-in ATSC/QAM tuner that supports digital and analog TV signals.
3. Install the WinTV software from the CD that came with the device or download it from [https://www.hauppauge.com/pages/support/support\_wintv7.html](https://www.hauppauge.com/pages/support/support_wintv7.html). You will need to enter your 24 digit serial number during the installation process.
4. Launch the WinTV application and scan for available TV channels. You can also adjust the settings and preferences according to your needs.
5. Enjoy watching and recording live TV on your computer. You can also pause, rewind, and fast-forward live TV with the TimeShift feature. You can also schedule recordings with the 8cf37b1e13
